mapper.select: select param_value from bas_param where param_code = #{param_code} and wh_id = #{wh_id}
mapper.update:
insert into order_out (order_out_id, order_out_code, owner_id, wh_id, order_type, order_biz_type, status, customer_id, dates, pickup_type, bill_staff, remark) select #{order_out_id}, a.danj_no, NVL(C.OWNER_ID,A.HUOZ_ID), D.WH_ID, #{order_type}, #{order_biz_type}, 10, b.customer_id, to_char(RIQI_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'), a.tih_way, a.yew_staff, a.note from inf_ck_kpd_bill a left join bas_customer b on #{danw_id}=b.customer_id_erp and b.CUSTOM_TYPE= 2 LEFT JOIN BAS_OWNER C ON A.HUOZ_ID =C.OWNER_CODE and b.owner_id=c.owner_id inner join bas_wh d on a.wlzx_code=d.WH_CODE where danj_no = #{danj_no} and huoz_id = #{huoz_id}
and rownum = 1

insert into order_out_details (order_out_id, line_no, item_id, package_id, qty, quality, lot01, lot12, status, BUSINESS_CODE, BUSINESS_CODE_LINE, KAIP_DW, FAC_ERP) select #{order_out_id}, rownum, b.item_id, d.package_id, a.num, 2, a.lot, a.kub_erp, 10,--初始状态 a.danj_no, a.hanghao, a.KAIP_DW, a.FAC_ERP from inf_ck_kpd_bill a left join bas_item b on a.shangp_id=b.item_code left join bas_owner c on a.huoz_id=c.owner_code and b.owner_id=c.owner_id left join bas_package d on b.item_id=d.item_id
where danj_no = #{danj_no} and huoz_id = #{huoz_id}

insert into order_out_merge (order_merge_id, order_merge_code, line_no, pickup_type, dates, customer_id, owner_id, wh_id, order_type, order_biz_type, item_id, package_id, qty, quality, lot01, lot12, bill_staff, is_merge, BUSINESS_CODE_LINE, KAIP_DW, FAC_ERP) select #{order_out_id}, a.danj_no, rownum, a.tih_way, to_char(RIQI_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd'), b.customer_id, c.owner_id, d.wh_id, #{order_type}, #{order_biz_type}, b.item_id, d.package_id, a.num, 2, a.lot, a.kub_erp, a.yew_staff, 1, a.hanghao, a.KAIP_DW, a.FAC_ERP from inf_ck_kpd_bill a left join bas_customer b on #{danw_id}=b.customer_id_erp and b.CUSTOM_TYPE= 2 LEFT JOIN BAS_OWNER C ON A.HUOZ_ID =C.OWNER_CODE and b.owner_id=c.owner_id and c.owner_id=b1.owner_id inner join bas_wh d on a.wlzx_code=d.WH_CODE left join bas_item b1 on a.shangp_id=b1.item_code left join bas_package d1 on b1.item_id=d1.item_id
where danj_no = #{danj_no} and huoz_id = #{huoz_id}
